name: Herbalist Helper Vol. (Rare)
entries: This tome contains the secrets of medical knowledge, plants, and poultices.

It can be read over 1 week to learn the use for one rare or lower plant, determined randomly. Alternatively, a creature reading it can instead read the book to increase their Gardening, Doctor, or Alchemist labor tier by 2.
Once this book has been used in this way 3 times it becomes no longer magical. Reading the book can be done during leisure time which requires 8 hours of reading in that week.
